entry.title: Spot Bitcoin ETFs Record Largest Single-Day Inflow Since Early June
entry.summary:
The market performance of the spot Bitcoin ETFs (exchange-traded funds) in the United States has been impressive over the last few weeks. Continuing their excellent streak, the crypto investment products closed the previous trading week with their best single-day performance in almost four months.
The positive investor sentiment surrounding the spot ETFs seems to have also bubbled into the Bitcoin and the general crypto market, which has recovered well from an early price slump in September.¬†
US Bitcoin ETFs Post Nearly $500 Million In A Single Day

entry.title: Tornado Cash Dev Roman Storm Set For Trial As Court Rejects Motion To Dismiss
entry.summary:
In a significant legal case, Tornado Cash co-founder Roman Storm will now face a legal trial after the US court rejected a motion to dismiss several charges filed against the defendant by the US Department of Justice. This development comes a year after the DOJ announced an indictment against Storm and fellow Tornado Cash developer Roman Semenov.
Tornado Cash Developer Fails To Convince US Judge
According to US authorities, Storm and Semenov are two of three persons who created, promoted, and operated Tornado Cash, a digital platform that has facilitated over $1 billion in money laundering profit for several criminals including prominent syndicates such as the Lazarus Group. For context, Tornado Cash is a popular decentralized cryptocurrency protocol that mixes multiple assets to obs‚Ä¶

Stablecoin‚Äôs now 18th biggest holder of treasuries. Consensys lawsuit against SEC dismissed. Partisanship will stop Trump crypto plans: Hoskinson. Scaramucci working with Kamala on crypto.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 201 - CRYPTO FLYS AFTER FED
entry.summary: Crypto rips higher after Fed cuts 50bps. $22bn shorts would be liquidated by $70.5k. SUI continues to lead L1s, does 2.5x in a month. Trump buys burgers with Bitcoin. Bitcoin is hedge against US debt: BlackRock. Commerzbank to offer BTC & ETH trading. Solana unveils Seeker phone, $70m pre-orders Helius Labs raise $21.75m. entry.title: FOMO HOUR 200 - DONALD TRUMP RECAP

SUI & FTM continue to outperform in L1s. BNB to introduce gasless stablecoin transfers. Tether market share hits 75%. Australia launches 3-year CBDC program. Russia to pay China in crypto for war supplies. USDC available for Brazil & Mexico bank transfers. We are one of the biggest users of blockchain: Dimon. Binance denies involvement in WazirX hack. Janus Henderson to tokenise fund. TON partners with Curve for stablecoin swaps. LINK & Fireblocks partner for stablecoin issuance. WalletConnect seat to airdrop 185m WCT tokens.

entry.title: How Jan 6. Organizer Became Meme Coin Kingpin
entry.summary: Dustin Stockton is known as the ‚ÄúGodfather of Political Finance‚Äù but he wasn‚Äôt always known this way. He was originally heavily involved in campaigning for Donald Trump and was the lead organizer of January 6. As the protest came closer, he realized things would go south and backed out. From home, he watched Trump supporters raid the capitol building. He knew his life was never going to be the same.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 199 - SO ABOUT YESTERDAY
entry.summary: Crypto majors bounce with stocks & gold after CPI. Kamala odds flip Trump after Presidential debate. SUI, FTM, ICP, TON lead gains in Alt L1s. Grayscale launches XRP trust, SUI to follow. FTX unstakes part of SOL position, large unlocks in Q1. 5 major announcements coming for SOL this month. SOL active addresses hits ATH for any blockchain. ENS integrated with Venmo & PayPal. Pendle introduces Bitcoin yield pools at 45%. POPCAT gets Kraken listing, leads top SOL memes. SUNDOG breaks $300m after ByBit spot listing. entry.title: Why CEO Jack Lu Is Pushing Magic Eden Beyond NFTs
entry.summary: Magic Eden's grip on the NFT market has been cemented by a multi-chain approach under co-founder and CEO Jack Lu. Now the marketplace is pushing forward with a digital wallet that bridges Bitcoin, Ethereum, and Solana as it eyes other future expansions. Lu discusses Magic Eden's evolution since its early days, along with valuable lessons learned in the turbulent crypto industry.

entry.title: Crypto Researcher Explains Meme Coin Mania
entry.summary: Head of Research at CoinMarketCap, Alice Liu, breaks down the highs and lows of meme coin mania in 2024. We‚Äôve seen meme coins like Dogwifhat (WIF) soar to huge market caps and we‚Äôve seen political meme coins crash as the candidate drops out (BODEN). Liu explains the data behind all of this.
